name: Tyler Hatch
title: Master Grower, Cannabis Processor
coverLetter:
Dear Trimmerwork.Com,


As a highly skilled Expert Trimmer and Master Gardener having a passion for natural health and medicine, I read your posting with much interest. My experience aligns well with the qualifications you are seeking at your Cannabis Co., in my particular role as Expert Trimmer, and I am certain I would make a valuable addition to your organization.

With having more than five years’ experience as a Expert Trimmer I am skilled in processing and packaging medicinal cannabis how the customer prefers. Fine attention to details, Organization skills, and environment and plant hygiene. I’m positive and enthusiastic, and can sit and focus for long periods of time. I excel at:


+ Familiarity of genetics and how different types grow.

+ Processing plants to bring the highest yield, and quality every harvest.

+ Recommending and implementing successful time and cost efficient strategies.

+ Hard working, friendly attitude.

+ Getting the job done.


In addition to my experience and personal qualities, I have a solid foundation and passion for working with cannabis. I am extremely enthusiastic about the evolution of the medical cannabis industry and keeping up with the changes. I have also have my own trim equipment, and can process a minimum one pound in one four hour shift.


Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Tyler Hatch
experience:
Master Gardener 2010-Present

- Master gardener for outdoor and indoor gardens of all sizes.

- Managing processing crews, for harvesting, trimming, and hash-making, as well as ensuring quality work in a timely fashion.

-Vendor and Salesperson.

NorCal Trimmers 2015-2016

-Harvesting and Trimming for private clients, and local dispensaries in Northern California
